name: Kenya School of Flying
about: Kenya School of Flying is a professional flight training school based in Kenya, with its main campus at Wilson Airport in Nairobi and additional flight bases at Malindi, Orly Airpark, and Ukunda airstrip. We offer personalized training for Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Night Rating, and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), including unique courses such as spinning at PPL level and Morse code at CPL level. Our students have access to a Redbird FMX twin-engine, full motion simulator and our own maintenance facility, ensuring safety and hands-on experience. We provide residential accommodation and a subsidized Cessna Caravan Rating, enhancing job prospects. Our experienced instructors emphasize professionalism and safety ethics, preparing students for careers in aviation.
